<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Absorb Toxin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2826) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
You are not immune to [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw against a disease or poison effect that affects an area.

</column>

---

Your skin readily absorbs poison and can consciously draw toxins into your body to spare others. Attempt a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check against the triggering effect; your counteract level equals half your level (rounded up), and for the roll use either your class DC –10 or your spellcasting ability modifier plus your spellcasting proficiency bonus. If you counteract the triggering effect, you end the effect for all other creatures in the area; however, you must still save against the effect with a –2 penalty to the initial save.
name: Absorb Toxin
prerequisite: You are not immune to diseases or poisons
